Job Title: VP, Product Management AI - GTM

Location: San Francisco, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Product Management

Description:
To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.

Job Category

Product

Job Details

About Salesforce

We’re Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good – you’ve come to the right place.

We seek an innovative, experienced product leader with a track record of driving GTM capabilities for new AI products from concept to successful delivery, market leadership, and ACV growth. This role will report closely to the product, marketing, and distribution teams. It will be responsible for developing scale sales programs, field enablement, strategic deals, partnering with GSIs, and bringing insights from the field into the product and Marketing organizations.

The highly cross-functional role requires a candidate who enjoys navigating ambiguity, working in a fast-paced startup-like environment, aligning with executive collaborators, collaborating with teams across time zones, and thinking globally. This leader supports ACV and pipeline growth and market adoption, working in tight-knit collaboration with industry clouds and strategy teams, sales, BVS, sales enablement, alliances, product marketing, and other product teams. This individual is encouraged to work with senior-level customer team members.

Responsibilities

Ensure early product success in the market by developing scaled programs and content to drive engagement, pipeline, and ACV.Build and supervise success metrics for programs.Synthesize the needs across regions and industries to build and scale components that can act as multipliers across distribution channels and market segments.Partner with the Product Marketing, Enablement, and POP teams to develop and deliver internal training and scale content and resources.AI transformation and thought leadership. Support Salesforce, partner, and industry speaking events as required.Support cross-cloud product launches and GTM in all regions. Educate and provide learning support to our Distributors, CSG, and partners at the C-Suite. Coordinate and evaluate language-specific requirements for Einstein One Copilots and Einstein AI platforms.

Customer Engagement Responsibilities

Deal support as an AI subject matter authorityEngage directly with customers during pre-sales and post-sales implementations to drive

pipeline and product adoption

Present product vision and strategy to customer executives in our special

Salesforce Innovation Center

Participate in Product Advisory Councils in key regions globallyEvangelize our roadmap with our customers, partners, and employees.

Who You Are

Passionate. You love the intersection of building products, deeply understanding

customer and market needs, and driving scale through all parts of our organization.

Authority. You have a tried understanding of CRM, AI, Data, and Analytics products.Humble. You are scaling others to be our AI storytellers and advocates.Curious. You dive into new insights and ways of working and enjoy bringing your own thoughts and suggestions to the conversation.Engaged. You’re comfortable jumping into a conversation as you listen to the topics.Leader. You inspire trust in team members and can motivate change positively and productively.Self-starter. You have high internal motivation, anticipate unrealized opportunities, problems, and risks, and can thrive in fast-moving technology spaces.Customer obsessed. You have the ability to put yourself in the customer’s shoes to understand their needs and deliver a POV and vision forward.You are a strong communicator. You can show a vision of the future and bring people

along. You have strong presentation abilities, especially those related to building

compelling narratives.

Collaborator. You thrive in a multi-stakeholder world.

Qualifications

High energy and passion for the jobThe equivalent of 15+ years of product management or similar experience.Hands-on AI Product experience (ML, Gen AI)Experience in driving strategic sales engagementsExperience in working in fast-paced startup environmentsExperience drive scale and repeatable process programsStrong organizational and analytical abilities, excellent written and oral communication skills, and experience in high-level business discussions.Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience. (A focus on engineering, computer science, and data science is a plus)Ability to lead with Salesforce values and cultureComplete with patience under pressure and a sense of humor and camaraderieOutstanding interpersonal skills that span across various cultures and professional

backgrounds

Accommodations

If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.

Posting Statement

At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at www.equality.com and explore our company benefits at www.salesforcebenefits.com.

Salesforce is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce.

﻿Salesforce welcomes all.

Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance and the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring, Salesforce will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

For California-based roles, the base salary hiring range for this position is $295,600 to $472,900.

Compensation offered will be determined by factors such as location, level, job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Certain roles may be eligible for incentive compensation, equity, benefits. More details about our company benefits can be found at the following link: https://www.salesforcebenefits.com.

Experience Level (if available): None
